r.s: Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol
r.d: Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket:: class.
r.n: - The SMTP server's SIZE capability is now honored. - Improved support for SMTP authentication (LOGIN, PLAIN, CRAM-MD5, DIGEST-MD5). - Overhauled the server response parsing system. - Added optional debugging output (enabled via setDebug()). - A timeout value can now be specified for the socket connection.
